p: In a preliminary work on Piper betle leaf EO from Sri Lanka, the authors identified (but didn’t quantify) the following compounds [ 52]: safrole, eugenol, allyl pyrocatechol diacetate, chavibitol acetate, β-phellandrene, terpinen-4-ol, estragole, anethole, 1,8-cineole, linalool, α-pinene, and methyl eugenol.
